1.name: Saving Private Ryan
1.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

2.name: The Big Lebowski
2.description: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

3.name: American History X
3.description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

4.name: The Truman Show
4.description: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

5.name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
5.description: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

6.name: U.S. Marshals
6.description: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

7.name: Blade
7.description: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

8.name: The Parent Trap
8.description: Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, later discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

9.name: Armageddon
9.description: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, N.A.S.A. recruits a misfit team of deep core drillers to save the planet.

10.name: The Faculty
10.description: Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurrences.

11.name: Practical Magic
11.description: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.

12.name: Meet Joe Black
12.description: Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter.

13.name: You've Got Mail
13.description: Two business rivals who despise each other in real life unwittingly fall in love over the Internet.

14.name: The Waterboy
14.description: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

15.name: Wild Things
15.description: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

16.name: Mulan
16.description: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

17.name: Shakespeare in Love
17.description: A young Shakespeare, out of ideas and short of cash, meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

18.name: There's Something About Mary
18.description: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

19.name: Enemy of the State
19.description: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.

20.name: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
20.description: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

21.name: EverAfter
21.description: The Brothers Grimm arrive at the home of a wealthy Grande Dame who speaks of the many legends surrounding the fable of the cinder girl before telling the "true" story of her ancestor.

22.name: A Bug's Life
22.description: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

23.name: The Thin Red Line
23.description: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

24.name: Godzilla
24.description: A giant, reptilian monster surfaces, leaving destruction in its wake as it strides into New York City. To stop it, an earthworm scientist, his reporter ex-girlfriend, and other unlikely heroes team up to save their city.

25.name: The Mask of Zorro
25.description: A young thief (Antonio Banderas), seeking revenge for the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro (Sir Anthony Hopkins), who also pursues vengeance of his own.

26.name: Dark City
26.description: A man struggles with memories of his past, which includes a wife he cannot remember, and a nightmarish world without a sun.

27.name: Belly
27.description: A pair of violent Men have spiritual awakenings.

28.name: The Prince of Egypt
28.description: An Egyptian prince learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

29.name: Rush Hour
29.description: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

30.name: What Dreams May Come
30.description: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

31.name: The Man in the Iron Mask
31.description: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

32.name: Bride of Chucky
32.description: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

33.name: The Wedding Singer
33.description: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

34.name: Deep Impact
34.description: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?

35.name: Can't Hardly Wait
35.description: Multicharacter teenage comedy about high school graduates with different agenda of life on graduation night.

36.name: Out of Sight
36.description: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

37.name: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
37.description: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time, as the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

38.name: Disturbing Behavior
38.description: The new kid in Cradle Bay, Washington stumbles across something sinister about the town's method of transforming its unruly teens into upstanding citizens.

39.name: Lost in Space
39.description: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

40.name: Ronin
40.description: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

41.name: Pleasantville
41.description: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom, where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

42.name: Elizabeth
42.description: The early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

43.name: Rushmore
43.description: The extracurricular king of Rushmore Preparatory School is put on academic probation.

44.name: Psycho
44.description: A young female embezzler arrives at the Bates Motel, which has terrible secrets of its own.

45.name: Urban Legend
45.description: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

46.name: Lethal Weapon 4
46.description: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with deadly Chinese triads that are trying to free their former leaders out of prison and onto American soil.

47.name: Small Soldiers
47.description: When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.

48.name: Blues Brothers 2000
48.description: Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another "Mission from God."

49.name: Fallen
49.description: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

50.name: Monella
50.description: Set in the 1950s Italian countryside, the film tells the story of Lola and Masetto, a young couple whose views on premarital sex differ drastically.
